sen.j: 烏丸御池（からすまおいけ）は、京都府京都市にある烏丸通と御池通の交差点、またはその周辺地域である。
sen.e: Karasuma Oike indicates an intersection of Karasuma-dori Street and Oike-dori, or its surrounding area.
Karasuma Oike indicates an intersection of Karasuma-dori Street and Oike-dori, or its surrounding area.
Karasuma Oike indicates an intersection of Karasuma-dori Street and Oike-dori Street in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, or its surrounding area.

sen.j: 周辺はオフィス街となっている。
sen.e: The surrounding area is a business district.
The surrounding area is a business district.
The surrounding area is a business district.

sen.e: Shin-puh-kan - Commercial complex (registered tangible cultural property of Kyoto City) * one-minute walk to the south from the intersection
Shin-puh-kan - Commercial complex (registered tangible cultural property of Kyoto City) * one-minute walk to the south from the intersection
Shin-puh-kan - Commercial complex (registered tangible cultural property of Kyoto City) * one-minute walk to the south from the intersection

sen.j: 現在は京都文化博物館別館として使用

At present, this is used as the Annex to the Museum of Kyoto.
At present, this is used as the Annex to the Museum of Kyoto.
